Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to clarifying accountability standards, open meetings law and freedom of information requirements to local development corporations
Summary: Clarifies the application of the accountability standards, open meetings law and freedom of information requirements to local development corporations as defined in section two of the public authorities law.
LawCode: Amd §§2800, 2801, 2895, 2896 & 2897, Pub Auth L; amd §51, Exec L; amd §§86 & 102, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, the executive law and the public officers law, in relation to clarifying the application of the accountability standards, open meetings law and freedom of information requirements to local development corporations
